Package com.rapidminer.belt.column

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.belt.column.Statistics
  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for computing column statistics. See Statistics.Statistic for supported statistics.
    Author:
    Michael Knopf

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Statistics.CategoricalIndexCounts
      Container for categorical index counts from categorical statistic calculations.
      static class  Statistics.Result
      Result container for a statistics computation.
      static class  Statistics.Statistic
      Column statistics.

      Statistics()

      Computes a single statistic for the given column.

      Computes one or more statistics for the given column.

      • Statistics

        public Statistics()

    • Method Detail

      • supported

        public static boolean supported​(Column column,
                                Statistics.Statistic statistic)
        Checks whether the given statistic is supported for the given column.
        Parameters:
        column - the column
        statistic - the statistic
        Returns:
        true iff the given statistic is supported
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null

      • compute

        public static Statistics.Result compute​(Column column,
                                        Statistics.Statistic statistic,
                                        Context ctx)
        Computes a single statistic for the given column. Please note that is strongly recommended to use compute(Column, Set, Context) instead of this method whenever multiple statistics are to be computed.
        Parameters:
        column - the column
        statistic - the statistic
        ctx - the context
        Returns:
        the result
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the statistic is not supported for the given column (see supported(Column, Statistic))

      • compute

        public static java.util.Map<Statistics.Statistic,​Statistics.Result> compute​(Column column,
                                                                                  java.util.Set<Statistics.Statistic> statistics,
                                                                                  Context ctx)
        Computes one or more statistics for the given column.
        Parameters:
        column - the column
        statistics - the statistics to compute
        ctx - the context
        Returns:
        the result set
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if any of the arguments is null
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if any of the statistics is not supported for the given column (see supported(Column, Statistic))
